TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BuildItem extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.DebuggerDisplay("BuildItem (Name = { Name }, Include = { Include }, FinalItemSpec = { FinalItemSpec }, Condition = { Condition } )")
System.Diagnostics.DebuggerDisplay("BuildItem (Name = { Name }, Include = { Include }, FinalItemSpec = { FinalItemSpec }, Condition = { Condition })")

summary.span: 表示 MSBuild 專案中的單一項目。

span.span: Represents a single item in an MSBuild project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在專案中的項目可以代表多個項目使用萬用字元。An element in a project can represent multiple items through the use of wildcards. 因此，每個物件不一定代表`Item`專案中的項目。Therefore, each object does not necessarily represent an `Item` element in the project. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並使用方法，將內容加入至專案。The following example creates a object and uses the method to add content to the project. ， ，和類別用來新增、 移除及變更專案中的項目。The , , and classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
